anathema: Allow others to slight you without retaliation, seek the approval of society, forgive those who have wronged you
edict: Expose hypocrisy (real or imagined) in others, make other creatures miserable, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Gyronna (The Angry Hag)](/Deities.aspx?ID=515)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Expose hypocrisy (real or imagined) in others, make other creatures miserable, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments

**Anathema** Allow others to slight you without retaliation, seek the approval of society, forgive those who have wronged you

**Area of Concern**
Extortion, hatred, spite

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=87), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1566)

- **2nd**
[Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=1623)

- **6th**
[Never Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1614)

</column>
name: Gyronna (The Angry Hag)
